item.description: About me Hi! Welcome to my blog! I’m uwuTeddy (aka TheSavageTeddy), a highschool student and CTF player from Western Australia. I play with team PissedEmu, and do all categories but mostly crypto, and learning pwn & rev currently. I am not sure what to post as of now, but it’ll probably be writeups for interesting challenges I’ve come across for CTFs! Enjoy!
item.content:
About me

Hi! Welcome to my blog! I’m uwuTeddy (aka TheSavageTeddy), a highschool student and CTF player from Western Australia.

I play with team PissedEmu, and do all categories but mostly crypto, and learning pwn & rev currently.

I am not sure what to post as of now, but it’ll probably be writeups for interesting challenges I’ve come across for CTFs! Enjoy!

item.description: Contact Feel free to reach out to me to talk about anything in general! Discord: TheSavageTeddy#7458 I have 200+ friend requests, if I don’t respond, please join Perth Socialware and try to send me a message directly Twitter: @theuwuteddy Email: theteddyhashed@gmail.com
item.content:
Contact

Feel free to reach out to me to talk about anything in general!

Discord: TheSavageTeddy#7458

  • I have 200+ friend requests, if I don’t respond, please join Perth Socialware and try to send me a message directly

Twitter: @theuwuteddy

Email: theteddyhashed@gmail.com
